snippet: Mr. Lhota charged that Mr. de Blasio has a history of raising taxes. Indeed, in 2003, while Mr. de Blasio was in the City Council, the Council voted to raise property taxes by 18.5 percent, as well as to increase the city sales tax and the income tax...
abstract: Mr. Lhota charged that Mr. de Blasio has a history of raising taxes. Indeed, in 2003, while Mr. de Blasio was in the City Council, the Council voted to raise property taxes by 18.5 percent, as well as to increase the city sales tax and the income tax for top earners.

headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
